title: Grow, Vegetables, Grow!
description: This book informs students of names and types of vegetables that can be grown in any garden, including a container garden on a rooftop in a city. The young boy in the story waters his various vegetable plants daily in hopes of creating his own salad.
meta: cucumber, grow, onion, plants, salad, vegetables
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant blend gr
Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant blend gr
Exclamation Marks : Recognize and use exclamation points
Content Vocabulary : Recognize and identify content-specific words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
